    Intro iovis

    Intro.Rmd
    library(ggmouse)

    Mouse data

    Track mouse movement

    Visualize mouse movement

    Raw

    visualize_mouse(mouse_track, type = "raw")

    Tinygrid

    visualize_mouse(mouse_track, type = "tinygrid")

    Dot

    visualize_mouse(mouse_track, type = "dot")

    Heatmap

    visualize_mouse(mouse_track, type = "heatmap")

    Hex

    visualize_mouse(mouse_track, type = "hex")
#> Warning: Computation failed in `stat_binhex()`:
#>   Package `hexbin` required for `stat_binhex`.
#>   Please install and try again.

    Grid

    visualize_mouse(mouse_track, type = "grid")

    Art

    visualize_mouse(mouse_track, type = "art")
